title: IDunion Trusted Issuer Accreditation
description: Verifiable credential to onboard to a trust list and accredit for issuance

id.description: Defines a unique identifier of the organization for which the ODI is issued (e.g. DID-subject)

legalName.title: Legal Name
legalName.description: Legal name of the organization the ODI is issued to

legalForm.title: Legal Form
legalForm.description: The legal form associated to the organization

issuingAuthorityName.title: Issuing authority name
issuingAuthorityName.description: Legal name of the organization that issued the ODI

issuingCountry.title: Issuing country
issuingCountry.description: An Alpha-2 country code as defined in ISO-3166-1

accreditedFor.description: Defines for issuance of which credentials the issuer is accredited for

limitJurisdiction.description: Limits the credential validity for a specific jurisdiction

schemaId.description: Verifiable Credential Schema ID the issuer is accredited to issue

types.description: Identifiers defining a specific Verifiable Credential type
